entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.1°C

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:49 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:49 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:49 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
